uploaded.  =
I have tested this version for 9 different wide crawls 
(500,000+ seeds) an=
d it has been working fine:

609

Changes since patch 2:  Fixes some rarely occurring retry code 
branch=
es and exceptions in the StatisticsTracker.

che.3.patch) is relative to the src 
directory of Heritrix 1.x svn rev 6131=
